description: Rep. Loretta Sanchez (D-Calif.) on Thursday doubled down on her critique of Donald Trump’s hosting “Saturday Night Live” this weekend — and suggested that the show might benefit from more diversity.Sanchez is among critics pressing NBC to dis-invite Trump, the GOP candidate who has made controversial remarks about illegal immigrants. In a speech on the House floor Thursday morning, Sanchez indicated that anger over Trump’s hosting gig has deeper roots.Read full article >>
title: Reliable Source: Rep. Loretta Sanchez pokes ‘SNL’ for Trump as host: ‘no Latino cast member’
